descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
# Dynamic VR gameplay

Immerse yourself in a snow battle in virtual reality! In Snow Defense you will have to defend your fortress against endless waves of enemies using unique weapons and tactical skills. 
[media]

# Protect your fortress from fire elementals!
Fire and mystical elementals attack from all sides, their relentless assault threatening to consume everything in their path. Will you summon the courage and strength to withstand their fury and safeguard the promise of a bright new year?
[media]

# Strategy and Development
Every decision matters! Upgrade your weapons, place them on towers and adapt to new types of enemies. Your arsenal is the key to victory.
[media]

# A stunning winter world
Enjoy the magical atmosphere of a snowy canyon, where every battle is accompanied by mesmerizing effects and impressive destructibility of enemies.
[media]

# Ready to take on the challenge?
Defend your fortress, test your strategic skills and enjoy the thrilling VR action. 

**Snow Defense is waiting for you!**
